resources.string: A teen girl has her eyes set on a boy for her lovesick best friend. However, things become complicated when she falls in love and is forced to choose between love and friendship.
A young man makes a living by selling drugs in a back alley in Paris. His mother visits him as a ghost. The world and time have changed, yet the connection between them is eternal.

At a fading vacation resort, 11-year-old Sophie treasures rare time together with her loving and idealistic father, Calum. Twenty years later, Sophie’s tender recollections of their last holiday become a powerful and heartrending portrait of their relationship.

A young man working as a housekeeper in an empty mansion. When its owner returns to start his mayoral election campaign, the young man bonds with him and defends him when his campaign is vandalized, setting off a chain of violence.
Nana, a gentle, beautiful young woman, escapes a violent anti-communist purge. Afterwards she lives comfortably as the second wife of a rich Sundanese man but her past re-emerges in her dreams.
When a young mother reconsiders abandoning her baby, she discovers a scheme selling foundlings for adoption.
A detective investigating a man\'s death in the mountains ends up meeting and developing feelings for the dead man\'s mysterious wife in the course of his dogged sleuthing.

When an interdimensional rupture unravels reality, an unlikely hero must channel her newfound powers to fight bizarre and bewildering dangers from the multiverse as the fate of the world hangs in the balance.

A journalist descends into the dark underbelly of the Iranian holy city of Mashhad as she investigates the serial killings of sex workers by the so-called Spider Killer, who believes he is cleansing the streets of sinners.

High school student Sohee starts training at a call center, but she faces the pressure of a greedy company, which leads to her death. Detective Oh Yu-jin, who has something in common with Sohee, begins to follow clues to reveal the truth.
A 25-year-old French woman returns to South Korea, where she was born, for the very first time. She decides to look for her biological parents, but her journey takes a surprising turn.

On a remote island off the coast of Ireland, Pádraic is devastated when his buddy Colm suddenly puts an end to their lifelong friendship. With help from his sister and a troubled young islander, Pádraic sets out to repair the damaged relationship by any means necessary. However, as Colm\'s resolve only strengthens, he soon delivers an ultimatum that leads to shocking consequences.
Kim You-jung, Byeon Woo-seok, Roh Yoon-seo, Park Jung-woo
